publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2145 Duncan McNeil: Congratulations to Ardgowan Hospice—That the Parliament congratulates Ardgowan Hospice volunteers on receiving the prestigious Queen’s Award for Voluntary Service; extends grateful thanks to all those volunteers who give freely of their time to raise funds, provide transport, staff the hospice shop, and carry out reception and kitchen duties, and recognises that without such commitment there would be no hospice movement.

S3M-2145 Duncan McNeil: Congratulations to Ardgowan Hospice—That the Parliament congratulates Ardgowan Hospice volunteers on receiving the prestigious Queen’s Award for Voluntary Service; extends grateful thanks to all those volunteers who give freely of their time to raise funds, provide transport, staff the hospice shop, and carry out reception and kitchen duties, and recognises that without such commitment there would be no hospice movement.
S3M-2145Congratulations to Ardgowan Hospice (lodged on 12 June 2008) Stuart McMillan* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
